item.description: The Coolidge Corner Theatre is showing an archival 35mm print of T2 on Monday, May 20 as part of its Science on Screen series. Thad Starner, a pioneering researcher in wearable computing who has been called one of the world's leading experts on what it's like to live a cyborg's life, speaks before the film. Starner, an associate professor in the School of Interactive Computing at Georgia Tech and a technical lead on Google's Project Glass, was inspired by the Terminator films as an undergrad at MIT, where he also got his PhD. More info here: http://www.coolidge.org/content/terminator-2-judgment-day.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting outside the entrance with a meetup sign. If it's raining, I'll be holding the sunflower umbrella.
item.name: Terminator 2 with Wearable Computing Guru Thad Starner
